title: Wonderful Berlin in 1927 in color! [A.I. enhanced & colorized]

sources.title: Wonderful Berlin in 1927 in color! [A.I. enhanced & colorized]
sources.description: The original title of this film is "Symphony Of A Great City" or "Symphony of a Metropolis" (in German: Die "Sinfonie der Gro√üstadt"), by director Walter Ruttmann. Edmund Meisel composed the orchestral score for its original release. It covers one day in Berlin in 1927 and shows many events from dawn until well after dusk.
